Name: Figure of the god Ptah as a dwarf
Description: Faience figurine of the god Ptah, in the form of a dwarf. There is a suspension loop at the back for wear as an amulet; the head of the figure is now lost, but compare L1030:181 for the type. Ptah was a god of craft and the creative power particularly in metalwork. In the Late Period he could be depicted as a dwarf, the unusual anatomy expressing the difference and mysterious power of the creator.
